other_tests.findings: Lesion composed of mostly histiocytic cells positive for S100 protein and CD68, with emperipolesis.
The lesion was believed to be most consistent with an inflammatory process.
Marked improvement in vision: 20/25 in both eyes without corrective lenses.
Marked resolution of the patientâ€™s multiple skull base lesions.
Interval progression of enhancing lesions especially in the posterior fossa.
Resolution of the enhancing lesions both at the tuberculum sella and in the posterior fossa.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Complete resolution of previous symptoms after corticosteroid therapy.
